languages.text:
"Горькими тропами мудрость приходит,
Следом кровавых утрат и разбитых мечтаний,
Груз тяжких мыслей у ней на широких плечах,
И, не спросясь, к очагу в твоем доме садится".

"By bitter paths comes wisdom,
In wake of bloody losses
and shattered dreams,
Heavy thoughts weighing
on its broad shoulders,
It enters unbidden
and takes a seat
by your hearth."
languages.original_text:
"Горькими тропами мудрость приходит,
Следом кровавых утрат и разбитых мечтаний,
Груз тяжких мыслей у ней на широких плечах,
И, не спросясь, к очагу в твоем доме садится".

languages.text:
“智慧源于痛苦，
源于血腥的损失，
与破碎的梦想。
沉重的思绪，
落在他宽阔的肩膀上。
它不请自来，
大喇喇地坐在，
你的壁炉旁。”
languages.original_text:
"By bitter paths comes wisdom,
In wake of bloody losses
and shattered dreams,
Heavy thoughts weighing
on its broad shoulders,
It enters unbidden
and takes a seat
by your hearth."

它不请自来，

你的壁炉旁。”

languages.text:
「厳しい道にこそ知恵はあり、
血を流す敗北と
砕け散った夢から覚め、
その広い双肩に
重い思考がのしかかる、
招かれざる者が入り
腰を落ち着ける
お前の暖炉を前に」
languages.original_text:
"By bitter paths comes wisdom,
In wake of bloody losses
and shattered dreams,
Heavy thoughts weighing
on its broad shoulders,
It enters unbidden
and takes a seat
by your hearth."

languages.text:
«La sabiduría llega por oscuros caminos,
por pérdidas sangrientas,
en sueños fragmentados,
Con pensamientos pesados
sobre sus anchos hombros,
llega inesperada,
y después se sienta
junto a tu hogar».
languages.original_text:
"By bitter paths comes wisdom,
In wake of bloody losses
and shattered dreams,
Heavy thoughts weighing
on its broad shoulders,
It enters unbidden
and takes a seat
by your hearth."

languages.text:
« Amères sont les voies de la sagesse,
jonchées qu'elles sont de drames
et de rêves brisés.
Ses accablantes pensées
requièrent de rudes épaules,
pour qu'enfin à l'improviste
irrémédiablement elle s'installe
auprès de votre âtre. »
languages.original_text:
"By bitter paths comes wisdom,
In wake of bloody losses
and shattered dreams,
Heavy thoughts weighing
on its broad shoulders,
It enters unbidden
and takes a seat
by your hearth."

languages.text:
"Mit bitteren Wegen kommt Weisheit,
nach blutigen Niederlagen
und zerstörten Träumen,
mit schweren Gedanken
auf den breiten Schultern,
tritt sie ungefragt ein
und nimmt Platz
an Eurem Kamin."
languages.original_text:

Heavy thoughts weighing

and takes a seat

languages.text:
"Bilgelik acıyla kazanılır.
Kanlı kayıpların ışığında
ve yıkılan hayallerde.
Ağır düşünceler yük olur
geniş omuzlarında.
Davetsizce gelir
ve oturur
yüreğin tahtına."
languages.original_text:
"By bitter paths comes wisdom,
In wake of bloody losses
and shattered dreams,
Heavy thoughts weighing
on its broad shoulders,
It enters unbidden
and takes a seat
by your hearth."
